amendment.description: To prohibit taxpayer bailouts of fiscally irresponsible State and local governments.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4051, pursuant to the order of 5/18/2010, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes for the adoption of the amendment, was withdrawn in Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4051 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 50. Record Vote Number: 153.
